rev.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/67.101.215.148|67.101.215.148]] to last version by Bovineone
add BlackBerry 8703e to the device table
change "Blackberry" to "BlackBerry", since it's a product name, not a fruit
/* Models */ - Added Vodafone (UK) as Pearl carrier.
/* Keyboard */ Updated to the new 8100 which replaces the 7100
/* Models */ Added the new BB Pearl to the list
As WP wants to delete the WP article we will reference to the BBFAQ.
/* Keyboard */ Auto Text -> AutoText, as in menus
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/68.156.178.60|68.156.178.60]] ([[User talk:68.156.178.60|talk]]) to last version by 24.185.124.59
/* Other */ site that primarily exists to sell products or services
added link to another website that has blackberry content
qek and HTC devices added - support BB email just like Nokia and SE, application from operator needed
/* Other */ Revert change by 71.198.153.112; link is neither informative nor widely referenced.
Reverted 2 edits by [[Special:Contributions/63.77.80.23|63.77.80.23]] ([[User talk:63.77.80.23|talk]]) to last revision (69501735) by FlaBot using [[WP:VPRF|VP]]
/* Models */ fix table formatting for one entry
/* Popular culture */ ""an essential tool he couldn't be apart from" seems a bit POV
Removed link to deleted portal /* Corporate */
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/68.85.145.213|68.85.145.213]] ([[User talk:68.85.145.213|talk]]) to last version by 70.92.3.239
/* Third party software */ info about dev on the bb
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/216.56.5.226|216.56.5.226]] ([[User talk:216.56.5.226|talk]]) to last version by TJDay
/* References and notes */ relabel misleading link
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/69.57.247.63|69.57.247.63]] ([[User_talk:69.57.247.63|talk]]) to last version by Colonies Chris using [[User:AmiDaniel/VandalProof|VandalProof]]
/* External links */ Sorted links and removed some of the commercial and/or less informative (see [[WP:NOT]])
/* Social usage */ Corrected a misspelling of 'to' from the previous 'do'.
rv. I can find no reference to this rumor, and WIkipedia is not a crystal ball. If you have a source, please re-edit and include the citation
Further revisions, moved patent dispute discuss to NTP article.
Removing big list of commercial linkspam. If someone feels the need to discuss providers, please add the section back as prose with links to articles. [[WP:NOT|Wikipedia is not a link repository]]
Add info about USPTO actions and RIM-NTP agreement. See discussion.
Delink months and days of week &/or general fixes using [[Wikipedia:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/69.90.52.85|69.90.52.85]] ([[User talk:69.90.52.85|talk]]) to last version by Yamamoto Ichiro
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/69.90.52.85|69.90.52.85]] ([[User talk:69.90.52.85|talk]]) to last version by Yamamoto Ichiro
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/69.90.52.85|69.90.52.85]] ([[User talk:69.90.52.85|talk]]) to last version by 85.219.149.24
Split lawsuit stuff to own paragraph.
/* External links */ removed a link to ads
→ internal link to SMS: short message service
Patent dispute "could conceivably force [RIM] to suspend most service to most BlackBerry users in the [[United States|U.S.]] 30 days after a [[February 24]] injunction, with external link.
standard and consistent internal and/or external formatting
/* Europe */ Fix telefonica under spain and remove from overall Europe
/* North America */ split NorthAmerica into Canada and US
Removed simprit because the wikipedia should not endorse commercial entities without an outstanding reason
fix link to blackberryforums, incorrectly linked to pinstack; put bbf above pinstack, it
clean up link to 7100 tips page (no content on wikicities, all links to joern.de)
/* Name origin */ the reference page in Google's cache no longer exists
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/24.126.133.180|24.126.133.180]] ([[User talk:24.126.133.180|talk]]) to last version by Blah666
/* Models */ _my_ 7100t sure is legible outdoors - added modifer "better" to reduce slight POV bias
rv vandalism by 69.192.105.209 to last by 70.116.109.29
rv 8700 speculation and external link changes
/* Hardware */ mention 386 processor, and add hyperlinks to existing keywords
